data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Michoacán, Mexico.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Michoacán, Mexico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Michoacán, Mexico that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Michoacán who will make disciples who make disciples.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Michoacán, Mexico, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Michoacán that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 428,696 believers find a person of peace today among the 3,662,304 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Michoacán, Mexico a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

location.name: Michoacán
location.cities_list: Morelia, Uruapan, Zamora, Apatzingán, Heróica Zitácuaro
location.cities_list_w_pop: Morelia (597,511), Uruapan (264,439), Zamora (141,627), Apatzingán (99,010), Heróica Zitácuaro (84,307)
